title: Beautifully renovated 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment with modern updates f
posting_body: ['Beautifully renovated 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment with modern updates features, No Fee', 'Listing ID #: 138386', 'Price: $4,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Brownstone', 'Subway', 'Diplomats OK', 'Laundry', 'Roof Deck', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Fireplace', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Free Rent', 'Available for October 1 occupancy, this beautifully renovated 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment with modern updates features an updated kitchen (with dishwasher).', 'Additional features include:Details: *exposed brick*stainless steel appliances*modern bathroom*modern kitchen*dishwasher*hardwood floors*high ceilings*deco fireplaceLocated in the Gramercy area steps from shopping, nightlife and restaurants and just a short walk from Madison Square Park, and just minutes to the N, R, Q, 4, 5, and 6 subway lines.', 'Please call for access.', 'Pictures are representative of quality and type of renovation, not an indication of size or layout.', 'Jason Paulino', 'Phone: (646) 300-2984', 'Mobile: (646) 300-2984', 'Fax: (212) 227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 (646) 300-2984 \xa0 (646) 300-2984 \xa0 FAX (212) 227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Jason Paulino at (646) 300-2984']
